monogr.title: The rogue: or The life of Guzman de Alfarache : VVritten in Spanish by Matheo Aleman, seruant to his Catholike Maiestie, and borne in Sevill
monogr.author: Alemán, Mateo

div.head: THE PRINTER To the curious Reader.
div.p: IT were a hard taske and rarely to be performed, for any Printer to vndertake the printing of a Booke of this bulke and nature, without some faults; yea, were his Copy neuer so fayre, or his Apprehension so quicke. It is a decorum in Guzman to commit many Sol •… cismes, whose life was so full of disorders. This life of his being 26. seuerall times printed in the Spanish Tongue in a few years, did neuer appeare to the world, but with Errata's: which makes me the more presuming on your humane courtesie: And as in the first, so in this Second Part, vouchsafe with your pen, the amendment of these few faults, before you begin to read the rest of his life.
